job_posting.title: Data Analyst
job_posting.description:
Data Scientist - Vodafone

Location: London, UK (Hybrid - 3 days office, 2 days remote) | Other locations available: Manchester, Birmingham, Dublin Salary: £65,000 - £85,000 (depending on experience) + performance bonus Visa Sponsorship: Available for qualified candidates

Join Vodafone, a global leader in telecommunications and digital services, where innovation meets impact. We're transforming how the world connects, and we need exceptional data scientists to drive our digital future.

About Vodafone

At Vodafone, we connect millions of people, businesses, and communities worldwide. Our cutting-edge technology and data-driven approach power everything from 5G networks to IoT solutions. We're not just a telecom company – we're architects of the digital future, creating solutions that matter.

Our Commitment to Diversity: With 40% of our tech workforce identifying as women and active Employee Resource Groups including Pride, Cultural Diversity Network, and Parents & Carers, we're building an inclusive environment where everyone thrives.

The Opportunity

We're seeking a talented Data Scientist to join our 25-person Advanced Analytics team within the Digital Innovation department. You'll help unlock the power of data to revolutionize customer experiences and drive business growth. Working with massive datasets, cutting-edge technologies, and brilliant minds, you'll solve complex challenges in telecommunications.

Current Team Impact:

Reduced customer churn by 23% through predictive modeling
Saved £12M annually through network optimization algorithms
Improved customer satisfaction scores by 18% via personalization engines
What You'll Do

🔹 Develop and implement advanced machine learning models to optimize network performance and predict customer behavior

🔹 Analyze petabytes of network and customer data to uncover actionable insights that drive strategic decisions

🔹 Build predictive models for customer churn, network optimization, and revenue forecasting using TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn

🔹 Collaborate with cross-functional teams including engineering, product, and business stakeholders to deliver data-driven solutions

🔹 Design and maintain scalable data pipelines and analytics infrastructure

🔹 Create compelling data visualizations and presentations to communicate complex findings to technical and non-technical audiences

🔹 Lead A/B testing initiatives to optimize customer experiences across digital touchpoints

🔹 Mentor junior team members and contribute to the growth of our data science practice

Current Projects You'll Contribute To

🎯 5G Network Intelligence: Building ML models to optimize 5G network deployment and performance

🎯 Customer 360 Platform: Creating unified customer profiles using graph analytics and deep learning

🎯 IoT Anomaly Detection: Developing real-time fraud detection for millions of connected devices

🎯 Conversational AI: Enhancing customer service chatbots with NLP and sentiment analysis

What We're Looking For

✅ Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related field (PhD preferred)

✅ 3+ years of hands-on experience in data science, preferably in telecommunications or technology

✅ Expert proficiency in Python, R, and SQL with experience in big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop)

✅ Strong foundation in machine learning algorithms, statistical modeling, and deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras)

✅ Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and distributed computing

✅ Proven track record of deploying models into production environments using MLOps practices

✅ Excellent problem-solving skills with the ability to work with ambiguous requirements

✅ Outstanding communication skills with the ability to translate complex technical concepts for diverse audiences

What Sets You Apart

📊 Experience with telecom-specific datasets (CDR, network logs, IoT data)

📊 Knowledge of 5G technology and its data implications

📊 Published research or contributions to open-source projects

📊 Experience with real-time analytics and streaming data platforms (Kafka, Flink)

What We Offer

🚀 Competitive salary package (£65,000 - £85,000) with performance-based bonuses

🚀 Comprehensive health, dental, and vision coverage for you and your family

🚀 Flexible working arrangements: 3 days office, 2 days remote

🚀 Generous annual leave (28 days) and sabbatical opportunities

🚀 Access to cutting-edge technology and £2,000 annual learning budget

🚀 Continuous learning opportunities including conferences, certifications, and internal training programs

🚀 Career development pathways with global mobility opportunities

🚀 Employee stock purchase plan and 10% retirement savings matching

🚀 Wellness programs and mental health support through dedicated apps

🚀 Discounted Vodafone products and services (50% off)

Your Impact After One Year

By your first anniversary, you'll have:

Deployed at least 3 production-ready ML models improving key business metrics
Reduced customer churn by measurable percentage through predictive analytics
Optimized network efficiency resulting in cost savings
Established yourself as a trusted data expert within the organization
Contributed to strategic initiatives shaping Vodafone's digital transformation
Interview Process

Timeline: 3-4 weeks from application to offer

1️⃣ Initial screening call with recruiter (30 mins)

2️⃣ Technical assessment (take-home or live coding - your choice)

3️⃣ Virtual panel interview with team members (90 mins)

4️⃣ Final interview with department head (45 mins)

5️⃣ Reference checks and offer

Ready to Shape the Future of Connectivity?

If you're passionate about using data to solve real-world problems and want to work at the forefront of telecommunications innovation, we want to hear from you.

Application Deadline: July 4, 2025

Vodafone is an equal opportunity employer committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. We welcome applications from all qualified candidates regardless of race, gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Join us in creating a better connected future for everyone.

#DataScience #MachineLearning #Telecommunications #HybridWork #TechJobs #Vodafone #DataScientist #London #UK

Selected Projects

sensors, and topographical data to enable field-specific planting recommendations.
• Sustainable Irrigation AI System — Developed reinforcement learning algorithm to optimize irrigation scheduling
based on weather forecasts, soil moisture, and plant growth stages.
